document.full_text: young voters, who were crucial to president barack obama's election in 2008, have not soured on him and now support the democrat in greater numbers than in the fall, according to a harvard university poll.
document.title: young voters have not abandoned obama: poll
lines_and_colors: young voters, who were crucial to president barack obama's election in 2008, have not soured on him and now support the democrat in greater numbers than in the fall, according to a harvard university poll.
